features: Measure, wash, cook and serve perfectly fluffy rice and grains in one
Set comprises of 2 L cooking pot, colander, measuring cup and multi-purpose rice paddle
Rice paddle can lock the pot lid whilst providing two convenient carrying handles
Paddle also can be used as a spoon for fluffing and serving cooked rice
body.description: Product Description M-Cuisine is a range of highly functional cookware that enables you to produce delicious, home-cooked food with ease in your microwave oven. All of the products in the range have been designed with convenience in mind and this is reflected in the multiple functions and ergonomics of each item. With M-Cuisine you can enjoy everything from a simple poached egg right up to a complete family meal. Go seamlessly from packet to table with this specially designed microwave rice cooker. This thoughtful design provides all the tools necessary to measure, wash, cook and serve fluffy rice and grains. It comprises a large 2 L cooking pot with lid, a colander, a measuring cup and a multi-purpose rice paddle that simultaneously locks the lid closed for cooking and also provides two convenient carry handles. To use, simply measure the desired quantity of rice or grains into the colander and then rinse and drain. Place the colander into the cooking pot, add the correct quantity of water and then secure the lid on top using the rice paddle. Fluff the rice or grains with the rice paddle before serving. Dishwasher safe. All the products in the M-Cuisine range are suitable for all power ratings in domestic microwaves. The power rating (wattage) specified on the packaging is for guidance only. All microwaves vary, please adjust the cooking time to suit your appliance. Brand Story By Joseph Joseph

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: M-Cuisine Microwave Rice & Grain Cooker This specially designed microwave rice cooker set comprises of a 2-litre (2.1 qt) cooking pot, colander, measuring cup and multi-purpose rice paddle.

Features & Use Measure Portion Size. Suitable For All Types of Grains. Rinse & Drain Lock & Carry. Rice Paddle Locks the Pot Lid and Provides Convenient Carrying Handles Serve. Paddle Can Be Used as Spoon for Fluffing & Serving Cooked Rice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It really works in less time than electric rice cookers
reviews.reviewText: I have only used the cooker a handful of times, but each time I've had perfect rice no matter what variety I use. I like the simple directions that list water, rice amounts and cooking time for each style of rice based on number of cups of cooked rice you want. Besides being visually good looking and well thought out where everything fits together and has a purpose it's truly easy to use, easy to store, and makes great rice in about 10 minutes with no mess.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not only does it work for ramen but so much more! And no mess
reviews.reviewText: This is probably one of my favorite kitchen appliances! Works for ramen, rice, noodles, beans and so much more without the mess of water over flowing and then things being crunchy because of that water loss. Zion is perfect and works just as well as the describe! I bring this with me every time I stay at a hotel and I've made 10 different meals out of it. Not to mention obviously making ramen and steam rice super quick and easy. If you have ADHD or any other reason for difficulty eating because of difficulty with food prep, I highly recommend this! I've made full meals in this. Steamed vegetables etc. Love love! Bought one as a gift for family and they loved also! I'm really impressed with the quality and I feel like this is going to last for years! And I absolutely love that it's dishwasher safe, because I don't like having anything that's not. I hand wash all my dishes to get the physical residue off but I really appreciate knowing that the dishwasher sanitizes everything. great for kids and teenagers so that they can make easy mess free quick snacks and meals after school or while parents are at work! Every household should have one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Delicious rice that's easy to make and can go in the dishwasher! Also it's not that big so doesn't take up too much space on my small kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A bit messy, but easy to use and good rice every time.
reviews.reviewText: NOTE: This is a review for the Joseph Joseph 45002 M-Cuisine Microwave Rice Cooker, not the Joseph Joseph 45001 M-Cuisine 4 Piece Stackable Microwave Cooking Set. I don't know why my review appears for both items. They are not the same.It took me a few tries to figure out the right amount of water and cooking time for my microwave, but now that I have, the rice comes out the same every time. No overcooked, under-cooked or soggy rice. So 5 stars for cooking rice. The only surprise for me has been how messy the cooker is. I never add more than one cup of raw rice -- so well within the capacity of the cooker -- but it boils over every time, leaving a gooey mess in the microwave. Even though I now put paper towels under the pot to catch the overflow, there still is cleanup. This is why I only give the cooker 4 stars. The inside of the microwave also drips with water at the end of the cooking time and has to be mopped out with a towel, but that probably is unavoidable and not a design flaw.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've been cooking rice in a Zorijushi rice cooker for probably about 25 years now. I usually put it on the fast cooking setting, which takes 35 minutes for white rice. Even though it's pretty fast, sometimes the 35 minutes still annoy me. Very often we have to wait for the rice cooker to finish when everything else is already done. So I started researching microwave rice cookers.I read lots and lots of reviews about these microwave rice cookers and was a bit hesitant to try it. There were many negative reviews that mentioned it leaking all over the microwave and producing rice that wasn't even edible. There were also positive reviews, so I decided to give it a try.I just used it for the first time this evening. I was running late, I'd forgotten to put rice in my cooker, so decided to unpack the microwave cooker that had been sitting in a box for many days and give it a try.I used Jasmine rice. 1 1/2 cup of rice. The instructions said 500ml water, so I did 2 cups and a little splash. I have a 1200 W microwave. The instructions are for 800 W. So I put my microwave on power setting 7 and had it cook for 15 minutes. After that I let it stand for another 5 minutes before opening it.When I opened the microwave, I saw nothing had leaked. Excellent! I then carefully opened the pot and it looked like real cooked rice! I fluffed it up a bit with the included paddle and put it on our dinner table. No need to get emergency rice out of our freezer! The quality of the rice was definitely not bad at all. Maybe slightly on the mushy side, so next time I might leave out the splash of water and do exactly 2 cups and maybe do 14 minutes instead of 15? I don't know yet. I might do a tiny bit of tweaking until I'm totally happy with the consistency. However, the first time trying, I got very edible rice. Oh, cleanup was easy too. So no stars to deduct for that. And I like it that you can wash the rice directly in the colander part of the cooker. So I'm going to give this cooker the full 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy-to-use & easy to clean.
reviews.reviewText: Roomy. Steamed a head of cauliflower and broccoli florets, together in one batch. Came out so tender. Cooks rice perfectly. Clean up is very easy. Dishwasher safe. Happy with this purchase and would buy it again.
This is amazing to have. Cook everything. Rice and quinoa cooks really good and perfect.
Excelente compra, el arroz sale Perfecto 👌🏼, ahorras mucho tiempo
Funciona muito bem, fiz com arroz curto e ficou como queria. Estava pensando em comprar uma panela elétrica para arroz mas agora não preciso ter mais um eletrodoméstico que só faz uma coisa.

reviews.reviewTitle: Cuiseur à riz impeccable. Rien à signaler
reviews.reviewText: Le cuiseur est hyper simple d'utilisation. Et le riz conserve toute ses saveurs, il est aussi savoureux que le riz fait à la casserole ou avec un cuiseur à riz électrique.
Man kan inte misslyckas med riset när man använder den här!
